basic_info.name: Bestier Ergonomic Gaming Chair - PU Leather gaming chair with Adjustable Footrest & Backrest, Lumbar Support
basic_info.short_description: Elevate your workspace or gaming setup with the ​PU Leather Ergonomic Office & Gaming Chair—a seamless blend of luxury, comfort, and versatility. Designed for marathon workdays or intense gaming sessions, this chair features ​premium PU leather upholstery that’s soft to the touch yet highly durable. resisting spills, scratches, and everyday wear.

care_instructions: Care & Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean
highlights: ADVANCED SPRING CUSHION - Gaming chair is equipped with advanced spring seat to improve the use of comfort, balance the distribution of hip pressure when sitting down, at the same time with high-density foam sponge, with high resilience advantages to adapt to changes in sitting posture, like a luxury sofa, easy to deform and collapse, high-quality cushion material to ensure long-term use of elasticity. Make your play time more enjoyable and relaxing.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN - The back of the computer chair and both sides of the cushion are equipped with a support design like wings, balancing the pressure brought by the body, providing sufficient space to achieve maximum support, you can switch positions at will, and maintain a comfortable experience. Stretch your body on the stretchable leather rest, cross your legs, and immerse yourself in relaxation.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL - The desk chair adopts a thickened metal base steel frame, is more robust and stable. Pu leather, soft skin wear resistant, will not crack, at the same time, after multiple tests upgraded 3 stage gas lift, can bear up to 275 pounds. 360° smooth rotating rubber caster, rolling quiet, no damage to the floor, solid metal base and lifting gas rod to ensure the use of stability and safety, to ensure durability, greatly extend the service life of the chair.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE - We provide you with detailed online installation video, short steps, easy assembly, package contains all installation accessories and paper instructions for your reference, at the same time, our customer service team is ready to provide you with effective and timely after-sales service, timely solution to your problems..
PEFECT FOR HYBIRD LIFESTYLE: this chair transitions flawlessly from a professional office environment to a high-energy gaming rig.
product_details.warranty: Warranty: 1 Year Limited Warranty. To obtain a copy of the manufacturer's or supplier's warranty for this item prior to purchasing the item, please call Target Guest Services at 1-800-591-3869

recent_reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] For a gamer, this chair seems to be an excellent choice. It offers comfort and is well-suited for extended periods of sitting. The footrest and lumbar support appear to be valuable additions, and the adjustable height and reclining feature are also quite appealing. Furthermore, the assembly process seems to be straightforward, thanks to the clear instructions provided.
recent_reviews.title: Excellent choice

recent_reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’ve been using the Besties Ergonomic Gaming Chair and honestly, it’s a game changer. Super comfy, great back support, and it still looks cute in my setup. I can sit in it for hours without feeling stiff or sore perfect for working from home or long gaming sessions.
recent_reviews.title: Great chair for long hour gaming or working.

recent_reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received bestier gaming chair, complimentary from Influenster for my honest review. It took me about an hour and a half to build it. It looks great and feels comfortable. I did not have 4 batteries to show the lights, but it’s everything we expected it to be. It’s a great gaming chair.
recent_reviews.title: Great gaming chair

recent_reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The style of the Bestier Gaming Chair with RGB LED Lights is sleek and futuristic and fits in with a gaming setup. It has LED lights trimmed around the seat and throughout the back of the chair. I found the lights fun and added energy to the atmosphere of my room. There are many settings for the lights. You can set the chair to display single colors or mix them. The pattern and speed of the LED lights can be adjusted using the remote. So far the Bestier Chair is comfortable to sit in for long periods of time. It has a large seat and the mesh back feels supportive. I like the high back, it allows me to lean all the way back and the headrest pillow is a nice touch. There are 2 separate levers for the tilt and height adjustment. The tilt has good range and is easy to use. The lumbar support pillow adds versatility because you can attach it or not use it at all. It's constructed using thick plastic, fabric, and mesh and seems durable.
recent_reviews.title: Comfortable and Fun Gaming Chair

recent_reviews.text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very nice and sturdy chair. Not super difficult to put together and really comfortable. I don’t really want the lights necessarily but they do work and I’m sure are for someone!
recent_reviews.title: Nice

recent_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, the instruction is very clear, I put them together quickly!
recent_reviews.title: easy to assemble

recent_reviews.text: The shipping is so fast, and arrived in good condition, I love it！
recent_reviews.title: shipping so fast
